idea:
Smart Sensing, Remote Monitoring

We believe in using technology to identify an object and build intelligent decision-making capability in a smart device.

We deliver robust, secure IoT solutions that are driven by device-generated data and comply with all the industry standards.

Equipped with best-in-class hardware and years of industry experience, the company connects physical items, software/technology platforms and business apps to provide solutions for intelligent management and quick decision making, enhancing business performance and profitability. (operational efficiency)

We are a digital transformation Consulting and Solution Providing company that provides cutting-edge technology solutions, helping companies and enterprises in simplifying the complex issues / Processes that always emerge during their evolution journey.

Our aim is to help enterprises accelerate the adoption of new monitoring technologies, help them implementing simpler yet impactful solutions for various problem areas that arise during the expansion, diversification, etc., and orchestrate ongoing innovation delivering an improvement of operational efficiency. Whether it is a consumer-oriented software/technology solution or a transformative enterprise-class solution, the company leads the process from ideation and concept to delivery and provides ongoing support.
name: KO-AAHAM TECHNOLOGIES LLP

idea: We are a Conversational AI company based in Mumbai. We develop AI growth tools for various Messaging channels. We make use of our deep understanding of Psychology and Technology to propel our clients towards success.
name: Pulsense Intelligent Solutions Private Limited

idea:
AyeTalk helps people and enterprises connect and communicate with each other. AyeTalk Enterprise API is a fast, secure and reliable way for Enterprises to reach their customers worldwide and deliver important information instantly.

The proposed solution aims to deliver messages generated by Bank to their user’s devices using AyeTalk Enterprise API, primarily via Internet Routing, for increased efficiency and cost effectiveness.
The client will integrate with the existing mechanism currently being used for sending SMS’s and, will not require any modification to be made at the enterprise’s end. A DIY (Do it yourself) console shall be provided to monitor the state of messages being sent including a detailed report with analytics and overall system health.
At the user’s end, the solution can be integrated with pre-existing bank applications at one click. Apart from that, the end users can choose from iOS, Android and PWA versions of ayeTalk to receive alerts over Internet routing or continue receiving SMS’s in case of no interest, non-registration or Internet unavailability.
name: AYESIGN DIGITAL PRIVATE LIMITED
